description:
A desktop app for ComfyUI, the most powerful and modular diffusion model GUI, api and backend with a graph/nodes interface

ComfyUI Desktop is a packaged way to use ComfyUI and comes bundled with a few things:
- Stable version of ComfyUI from releases
- ComfyUI_frontend
- ComfyUI-Manager
- uv
On startup, it will install all the necessary python dependencies with uv and start the ComfyUI server. The app will automatically update with stable releases of ComfyUI, ComfyUI-Manager, and the uv executable as well as some desktop specific features.
What's Changed
- Update README - pytorch cu128 by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1114
- Add API node support & frontend 1.17.9 by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1116
- v0.4.40 by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1117
- Update compiled packages to match core reqs by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1118
- Allow authentication popup windows on Comfy URLs by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1119
- [chore] Update frontend to 1.17.10 by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1120
- Add final core changes for API nodes by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1121
- Use named desktop branch for release by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1122
- [CI] Update requirements.txt patch to new FE version by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1123
- [chore] Update frontend to 1.17.11 by @webfiltered in https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/pull/1124
Full Changelog: https://github.com/Comfy-Org/desktop/compare/v0.4.39...v0.4.40
